channel.title: Animation on The B0ardside
channel.description: Recent content in Animation on The B0ardside

item.title: Plainview Public Access
item.description: This is a crazy awesome animation by Anthony Lombardo and John Chrostek – “It is one-o-clock in the morning. You’ve had a long and tiresome day, and despite your best intentions, dozed off far before you meant to. Asleep in the embrace of your old blue La-Z-Boy, you feel a flicker like a breeze full of static at room temperature. You awaken. The television is still on. Your eyes adjust.
